Name: Let's Learn Japanese! Katakana
About the game: Want to read Japanese? Let's learn Katakana! This game teaches you all the characters of the katakana alphabet, as well as their variations and combinations. You'll practice each character by playing fun mini-games, and you'll be reading Japanese before you know it.
